text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump AMERICAN JUNKIE TRAITOR DONALD J. TRUMP does not care one bit about our elderly. If you don't believe me ask the ones who passed away due to COVID19. Oh, you can't! They died BC Trump ignored the virus & called it a hoax as our seniors kept dying. And they still are!
